subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which year did the Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Board (RMSB) of Rajasthan come into existence?
question_hi: राजस्थान में राष्ट्रीय मध्यम शिक्षा बोर्ड (RMSB) क्या संविधान किया गया था ?
explanation_en: The Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Board of Rajasthan was established in 1982.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Board (RMSB) की संविधान 1982 में हुई थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
